channel.title: KBD Layer Lever id 487
channel.description: Hi guys I'm using easy rsc v1.1 as my source. I can't get the lever for kbd lair to work, it's item id is 487 any suggestions? When you go to pull the lever it does not do anything.

item.title: KBD Layer Lever id 487
item.dc:creator: @syn_acid syn acid
item.description:
@syn_acid wrote:

Okay thanks guys! My levers and KBD Lair now work thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: KBD Layer Lever id 487
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

Go to “Server/conf/server/locs/extras” there u gonna see the ObjectTelepoints.xml edit it and add:

[code=xml] 

	<Point>

		<x>282</x>

		<y>3020</y>

	</Point>

	<TelePoint>

		<command>pull</command>

		<x>567</x>

		<y>3330</y>

	</TelePoint>

</entry>

    <entry>

	<Point>

		<x>567</x>

		<y>3331</y>

	</Point>

	<TelePoint>

		<command>pull</command>

		<x>282</x>

		<y>3019</y>

	</TelePoint>

</entry>[/code]

I think that deal with the kbd lever.

Read full topic
